channel.title: Portforwarding prob
channel.description:
hello i needed help with port forwarding i port forwarded the Port 43594
and when i checked the port i got this
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/316m78o.png[/img]
then i got no-ip n the Duc client and i ran it n checked the no-ip
n then added the no-ip where it should be placed on the client but i get this in the end :|
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2li8v0l.png[/img]
can someone pls help me :(

item.title: Portforwarding prob
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

[quote=“me caveman, post:3, topic:358507”][quote author=kickyamom50 link=topic=455014.msg3331764#msg3331764 date=1283543388]
you can’t connect to the server with your portforwarded ip on your computer, link me to the client in a pm, i will download it and i will test it. You can’t connect to your ip address from your internet, since you’re already connected, only others can. I will test for you!
[/quote][/quote]

Yupp, lol, i just portforwarded my server today, and i’m officially off hamachi wewt! i can help you out bro, if you ever need help coding, portforwarding or anything, just pm or ask me, my msn is kickyamom@gmail.com i would be glad to help you, as long as you can help me a bit too see yah around
like he said, you cant test it yourself because you are the host, and the host cant go out and back in to test it lol. but im sure its fine, first time poster and you have pictures and all. good start. the more info the more people can help. but yeah, you just need a buddy to help you out.

EDIT:

dragonman2:

use ip 127.0.0.1

obviously…We just said that to him 2 times, that was un-needed

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding prob
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

kickyamom50:

you can’t connect to the server with your portforwarded ip on your computer, link me to the client in a pm, i will download it and i will test it. You can’t connect to your ip address from your internet, since you’re already connected, only others can. I will test for you!

like he said, you cant test it yourself because you are the host, and the host cant go out and back in to test it lol. but im sure its fine, first time poster and you have pictures and all. good start. the more info the more people can help. but yeah, you just need a buddy to help you out.

Read full topic
